attributes.action: Free parking facility for NHS workers in hospitals around England
attributes.additional_details: As rent, fuel and house prices have rocketed buying parking permits are making employees left with no saving by the end of year. NHS trust should provide free parking service to employees in hospital or reimburse yearly for amount spent on parking fee during shifts. Lot of NHS hospitals have been doing this but it has to be centralised in all NHS trusts around England so that parking tickets dont leave a huge hole in a persons savings.
attributes.background: With the increasing price of living cost in England & paying for parking tickets in NHS hospitals are leaving NHS colleagues crippled. Parking permit takes over a monthly 40-50 pound which add up around 500-600 pound a year.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612699
